title: DIY SYNTH VCO Part 1: How to build an analog oscillator core from scratch [Osc][-12,0,12V][Video]
description:
In this series, I'm taking a detailed look at how to build an analog VCO from scratch, using just a handful of cheap components. It's the basis for any synthesizer. To keep it as beginner-friendly as possible, I'm explaining what all the components do in detail.
This first part deals with the oscillator core, op amp-buffers, AC coupling and voltage dividers

bom.note: you can also use a TL072, we won't be needing more than one op amp

bom.spec: 2x 9V battery plus clip OR 1x dual 9-15V power supply
